entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers late this evening and then to 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
